title: game session's title
intro: introduction text (displayed before the game starts)
card_shuffle: true/false. If true: cards will be picked randomly, not in order. Default: false

feature1.name: name of the feature
feature1.visible: feature visibility on screen, true/false. Default: true

feature2.name: name of the feature
feature2.visible: feature visibility on screen, true/false. Default: true

feature3.name: name of the feature
feature3.visible: feature visibility on screen, true/false. Default: true

feature4.name: name of the feature
feature4.visible: feature visibility on screen, true/false. Default: true

win.text: text to be displayed when you win
win.feature_values: list of ints 0~100 or null (default: [null, null, null, null]

lose.text: text to be displayed when you lose

left_action.impact: List of integers, number of values should match number of features. Ex.: [-5, 0, 0, 15]

right_action.impact: List of integers, number of values should match number of features. Ex.: [-5, 0, 0, 15]
